reviews.review_msg: If you are willing to spend time thinking you will succeed. If you want a teacher that will give exams that are based on memorization of facts and numbers that you can just spit back out this isn't the instructor for you.

Amazing professor. Totally worth waking up for the morning classes. Respects students personal ideas over referencing. If you need some motivation back for school this is a Professor definitely worth taking a class with.  He can sometimes go off on a tangent but its usually interesting stuff. Beware of his TA. TOUGH MARKER!

I was on the fence about doing counselling but his views made me realize that there is no better field. He was SO amazing and I learnt so much from him. 356 was an easier, more structured class, but 355 was just as good. I wish he would teach more Psyc courses...he was hilarious and very insightful and I actually looked forward to the 8:30 classes.

Martin is AWESOME! Cannot rate him highly enough! He is not your typical dry prof, is funny, and I learnt a lot. There is a bit of lack of structure to his lectures, which i know others don't necessarily like and he talks super fast. I did well in the exams. My tip is to take very good notes. He gives every opportunity for you to do well!!!
